job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* 𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟏 : Recently started a long-term project to modernize our list trading system using modern C++ features and programming practices.
     * Working in a C++ environment on Windows and Linux platforms, enhancing and maintaining backend servers (C++) used for real-time trading applications, contributing during all phases of the project lifecycle, working with business counterparts to provide technical solutions to client needs, working with QA and supporting teams to address issues that arise during development and testing;
     * 𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟐 : This role will work primarily within our Treasury and Mortgage trading product groups. These products cover two of the most liquid asset classes in the world.

   Tradeweb is a market leader in providing innovative capabilities to some of the largest Investment Banks, Asset Managers, and Hedge Funds in these areas.

   The Developer will work in a C++ environment on the Windows platform and enhance and maintain backend servers (C++) used for real-time trading applications.

   𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟑 : In this role the work is done with a substantial codebase, requiring an inquiring and tenacious approach to development and maintenance.

   You'll need to implement code for interfacing with the Tradeweb Dealer Pricing System and Tradeweb Trading System. The Pricing Group develops distributed systems for publishing real-time Market Data.

   This group makes use of several 3rd party tools to distribute, store and retrieve market data TW LLM infrastructure, Tervela TMX, OneTick Database.
job_details.full_text:
C++ Developer

* 𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟏 : Recently started a long-term project to modernize our list trading system using modern C++ features and programming practices.
     * Working in a C++ environment on Windows and Linux platforms, enhancing and maintaining backend servers (C++) used for real-time trading applications, contributing during all phases of the project lifecycle, working with business counterparts to provide technical solutions to client needs, working with QA and supporting teams to address issues that arise during development and testing;
     * 𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟐 : This role will work primarily within our Treasury and Mortgage trading product groups. These products cover two of the most liquid asset classes in the world.

   Tradeweb is a market leader in providing innovative capabilities to some of the largest Investment Banks, Asset Managers, and Hedge Funds in these areas.

   The Developer will work in a C++ environment on the Windows platform and enhance and maintain backend servers (C++) used for real-time trading applications.

   𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟑 : In this role the work is done with a substantial codebase, requiring an inquiring and tenacious approach to development and maintenance.

   You'll need to implement code for interfacing with the Tradeweb Dealer Pricing System and Tradeweb Trading System. The Pricing Group develops distributed systems for publishing real-time Market Data.

   This group makes use of several 3rd party tools to distribute, store and retrieve market data TW LLM infrastructure, Tervela TMX, OneTick Database.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional C++ software development for financial trading systems. While it mentions 'TW LLM infrastructure', this is in the context of using third-party tools for data distribution and retrieval, not on developing or fine-tuning generative AI models. The core responsibilities and technologies described align with traditional software engineering rather than specialized AI roles like ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The job description repeatedly mentions enhancing and maintaining backend servers using C++, working with business counterparts to provide technical solutions, and contributing during all phases of the project lifecycle, which are core software development activities.
The role involves implementing code for interfacing with specific trading systems, which is a direct software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: implement code for interfacing with the Tradeweb Dealer Pricing System and Tradeweb Trading System

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'working with business counterparts to provide technical solutions to client needs', indicating a need to understand business requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: working with business counterparts to provide technical solutions to client needs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'modernize our list trading system using modern C++ features and programming practices' points to software development and modernization efforts.
job_tasks.phrase: modernize our list trading system using modern C++ features and programming practices

job_tasks.justification: While the primary focus is not AI modeling, the mention of 'TW LLM infrastructure' in the context of distributing, storing, and retrieving market data suggests some interaction with or understanding of systems that might involve LLM components, though not necessarily core model development.

soft_skills.phrase: requiring an inquiring and tenacious approach to development and maintenance
working with QA and supporting teams
